## KVConnector.deleteAll() method

Delete all entries

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteAll(modelClass: Class<Entity>, options?: Options): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  modelClass | <code>Class&lt;Entity&gt;</code> | Model class |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<number>`

A promise of the number of entries deleted
